name: Pumpkins (plankp)
description:
Pumpkins

If you want to play with touchscreen, play here instead (it's the same thing): https://plankp.github.io/Pumpkins/

How to Play
  1. Hit the Start to start the game
  2. Use arrow keys, WASD or HJKL (cough cough vim people)* on the lanes with Pumpkins to remove them
  3. Keep doing that until all Pumpkins are cleared

You want to clear all the pumpkins as fast as possible
*Or click/tap on the arrows themselves, see above for touchscreen version because itch.io don't like my touchscreen handling code...

Background

There was this mobile game I played a while ago (8 years ago?), and that was where I got the idea from. That mobile game had zombies and only three lanes instead.

Code (by me) and Assets (obviously not by me) is on GitHub in plankp/Pumpkins.
